snippet: The industry's leading makeup artists reveal the one tool they can't do without.
abstract: The industry's leading makeup artists reveal the one tool they can't do without.
lead_paragraph: Professional-grade cosmetic brushes are a central focus for spring, with options that range from Sephora's comprehensive offering to the targeted, product-specific collections of Tom Ford and Chanel. To help identify the worthy investments from the rest, we've enlisted the expertise of five of the industry's leading makeup artists. Here, they reveal the one tool they're rarely without.
